itunes:title: Women & Men in The Word: New Testament Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
title: Women & Men in The Word: New Testament Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
description:
To kick off our Women & Men in the Word: New Testament series, Raechel and Amanda are joined by returning guest and SRT team member, Jessica Lamb. Together, they take a long look at Jesus, as well as the stories of Elizabeth & Zechariah, Mary of Nazareth, John the Baptist, and Anna & Simeon. They discuss the importance of asking questions and wonder aloud what it must have been like to be Jesus’s mama or Zechariah’s son. Along the way, they manage to touch on the topics of fairytales, hammocks, Anne of Green Gables, and the sound of children laughing in the rain.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Women & Men in the Word: New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com.

Shop the Women & Men in the Word: New Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. June’s box will include our upcoming study Psalm 119: We Delight in Your Word.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/wmitwnt-week-1-with-jessica-lamb/
